text:
I try clicking on "Include Equals" and the checkmark is there by default, and 
it won't go away. The problem is that when URLs are submitted, they lack the 
equals sign even though the box is checked.
creator: rfagen@netflix.com

text:
It won't go away if you have a value for the argument because turning off the
equals sign is only valid when an argument has a name and no value.  This works
perfectly for me and I always see the equals sign between the name and value of
my arguments.  Could you be more specific about a scenario you can use to
recreate this problem, preferably outlining all your steps from jmeter startup
to problem recreation.
creator: mstover1@apache.org

text: Long enough without a response. Resolved as not reproducible.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
